name: MonteCube Dodge
description: Survive by dodging and deflecting enemies, objects and obstacles in VR. You are placed in an environment where you need to be agile and on your feet.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel i5 4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDA GTX 970 /AMD 290 equivalent or greater Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: N/A Additional Notes: Requires Oculus Rift
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel i5 4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDA GTX 970 /AMD 290 equivalent or greater Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: N/A Additional Notes: Requires Oculus Rift
